price: او موږ ستاسي د پاسه اوه لارې جوړې كړې دي او (تر هغو لاندې) مخلوق څخه موږ بې خبره نه يو.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا فَوۡقَكُمۡ سَبۡعَ طَرَآئِقَ وَمَا كُنَّا عَنِ ٱلۡخَلۡقِ غَٰفِلِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnā fawqakum sabʿa ṭarāiqa wamā kunnā ʿani al-khalqi ghāfilīna
